22-013SC.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes of the Sustainable City Commission meeting of Thursday, May 26, 2022.A motion was made by Gaines, seconded by Vice Chair Gaytan, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Page 1 of 5TELECONFERENCE, 4:00 PMTHURSDAY, JULY 28, 2022CITY OF LONG BEACHSUSTAINABLE CITY COMMISSION MINUTESYes: 8 - Donna Bergeron-Birge, Sona Coffee, Keisha Gaines, Rey Gonzales, Jenny Novak, Alan Tolkoff, Hilda Gaytan and Morgan WheelerAbsent: 2 - Carla Dillon and Coby Skye2.

22-014SC.summary: Recommendation to receive a presentation from the Pacific Gateway Workforce Innovation Network on the Youth Climate Corps Program.Reza Perl, Community Program Technician, provided the staff report.Commissioner Coffee spoke.Reza Perl, Community Program Technician, spoke.Vice Chair Gaytan spoke.Larry Rich, Sustainability Coordinator, spoke.Reza Perl, Community Program Technician, spoke.Commissioner Bergeron-Birge spoke.Reza Perl, Community Program Technician, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Commissioner Bergeron-Birge and Reza Perl, Community Program Technician.Edward spoke.Berlyn Maloa spoke.Dave Shukla spoke.A motion was made by Vice Chair Gaytan, seconded by Commissioner Bergeron-Birge, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 8 - Donna Bergeron-Birge, Sona Coffee, Keisha Gaines, Rey Gonzales, Jenny Novak, Alan Tolkoff, Hilda Gaytan and Morgan WheelerPage 2 of 5TELECONFERENCE, 4:00 PMTHURSDAY, JULY 28, 2022CITY OF LONG BEACHSUSTAINABLE CITY COMMISSION MINUTESAbsent: 2 - Carla Dillon and Coby Skye3.

22-015SC.summary: Recommendation to receive a presentation from the Long Beach Department of Public Works Mobility Team on Mobility Programs and Initiatives.Fern Nueno, Mobility Programs Officer, spoke; and provide a PowerPoint presentation.Ricardo Light, Transportation Planner, spoke.Reed Sherlock, Transportation Planner, spoke.Fern Nueno, Mobility Programs Officer, spoke.Chair Wheeler spoke.Reed Sherlock, Transportation Planner, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Chair Wheeler and Reed Sherlock, Transportation Planner.Commissioner Bergeron-Birge spoke.Ricardo Light, Transportation Planner spoke.A dialogue ensued between Commissioner Bergerone-Birge and Ricardo Light, Transportation Planner.Vice Chair Gaytan spoke.Fern Nueno, Mobility Programs Officer, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Vice Chair Gaytan and Fern Nueno, Mobility Programs Officer.Commissioner Tolkoff spoke.Fern Nueno, Mobility Programs Officer, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Commissioner Tolkoff and Fern Nueno, Page 3 of 5TELECONFERENCE, 4:00 PMTHURSDAY, JULY 28, 2022CITY OF LONG BEACHSUSTAINABLE CITY COMMISSION MINUTESMobility Programs Officer.Reed Sherlock, Transportation Planner, spoke.Commissioner Tolkoff spoke.Fern Nueno, Mobility Programs Officer, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Commissioner Tolkoff and Fern Nueno, Mobility Programs Officer.Pete Marsh spoke.A motion was made by Vice Chair Gaytan, seconded by Commissioner Gonzales, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 8 - Donna Bergeron-Birge, Sona Coffee, Keisha Gaines, Rey Gonzales, Jenny Novak, Alan Tolkoff, Hilda Gaytan and Morgan WheelerAbsent: 2 - Carla Dillon and Coby Skye4.
